reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: High Recommendation

reviews.text: After many pain staking hours trying to find a 4 star property, we read the reviews on this site and booked thinking we had found a great place. How wrong we were! Blatant lying after given the wrong room type was the main of many issues from this establishment. Only when we gave them eveidence from the room itself did they actually move us to the corect catogory. (they put us in a "superiour" room not the "delux room" as we had paid for) It was an uphill battle for them to admit that they had made a mistake and finally we were told that we could move to another room the following day. Take note that the room was small, no plazma TV as expected as per the website, the wrong incorrect meal, the wrong wine supplied, all with exceptional price tags (even for Paris) with no way of opening the bottle via room service.When the compaint was made with all the above, they didn't appear to be too concerned, moved us to the correct room catergory but made out that they were doing us the favour! Extremely disappointing to say the least, we were totally frustrated by their actions. We travel frequently world wide and always book a minimum of 4 star. Never In all of our years of travel, have I had such an experience. We moved to the La Tremoille who were fantastic, Exceptional large room, lovely room with views, truly a 4- 5 star hotel and wish that we had booked with them in the first instance!

description: This hotel is in a 19th-century mansion located just 435 yards from the Champs Elysees. It has a courtyard, free Wi-Fi and a sauna and hammam.Air-conditioned rooms at Hotel de Sers come with a flat-screen TV and DVD/CD player. Each room features quality touches such as an Italian marble bathroom or rosewood furniture. Many of the suites offer stunning views of Paris.Hotel de Sers’s restaurant is found at the end of the hotel’s portrait gallery and overlooks a tree-lined courtyard. Guests can dine in the dining room that features marble décor or in the outdoor terrace during summer. The hotel’s S'Bar is decorated with wood paneling and a marble bar and serves a variety of cocktails.Hotel de Sers is a 5 minute walk from George V and Alma – Marceau Metro stations, which gives guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites. Upon prior reservation, massages and airport shuttle service can also be organized.
